front.title: Parameters for Static Macroblocks and Aspect Ratio in the RTP Payload Format for H.264 Video

abstract.t: This document updates RFC 3984. It defines new optional parametersaddressing recent extensions currently supported in H.323 systems:The signalling of the maximum rate of static macroblocks a decoder isable to process. The signalling of the sample aspect ratio supportedby the sender or the receiver.
